author: rooneg
msg: * STATUS: Vote for r20518 and move it to approved.

author: maxb
msg: 1.4.x API consistency fix: make svn_wc_transmit_text_deltas2() use a digest
output parameter in the same way that all the other functions in our API do -
that is, instead of taking a pointer-to-pointer-to-storage and filling in a
pointer-to-storage, take a pointer-to-storage directly, and fill in the
Remove a typemap which is rendered redundant by the above.

author: rooneg
msg: Make svn_client_list (new in 1.4.x) use the usual convention for the
placement of the client context object.
Note that this must be merged back to 1.4.x before it is released, or
we will have to revert it for compatibility reasons.
(svn_client_list): Move the ctx argument to second to last.
